# darts-life

日々のダーツ練習を記録するためのアプリ

- TypeScript
- Vite
- React
- Capacitor
- TailwindCSS
- SQLite
- rechart

## 機能

- [x] 01 bull record
- [x] 01 bull status
- [ ] 01 T20 record
- [ ] 01 T20 status
- [ ] cricket 15~20 record
- [ ] cricket 15~20 status
- [ ] cricket bull record
- [ ] cricket bull status
